Just returned from Barcelona..All senses satiated; great music, art-drenched, food to fulfill any foodie, and culture around every corner.
Kids on high 2! Egyptian Museum, Tibidabo Park, zoo, Chocolate Museum whr they loved eating entry ticket (made of chocolate-of course!),
And of course the kids loved the Aquarium, "The best they've EVER seen!"!
I loved waterfront strolls, Frank Gehry imprints, La Rambla (a bit touristy though), Park Guell, food market.
Miro Museum a definite must. & dont underestimate those Catalonian Tapas!

The FTA will further focus on the WTO taking advantage of ASEAN and East Asian interests as a result of the FTA with key negotiators in East Asia.
The Thai-US bilateral FTA will continue to be a problem of the US. But it is possible to negotiate with new markets such as the Middle East, Eastern Europe and the EU.
FTA negotiations need to look at all sectors to prepare ahead. The important thing is not to do so much or sooner. But in the increased opportunities for people in society.
The impact of certain FTAs ​​must be recognized. It will improve some of our competition.

#i_love_thailand: having different opinions should be expressed properly The culture is good. With the power to create opportunities for Thailand.

#i_love_thailand: All Thai people should show gratitude to the land. Let's reiterate that the benefits of the country should come before its own benefits. If everyone follows this, the country will be calm.
There will be a two-day public holiday Monday to Wednesday, Wednesday and Wednesday. It is a day of Asha. And Lent Day.
This is the resolution of the Cabinet earlier to give a 5-day holiday to promote tourism in the country. I hope everyone will be happy.
Today, the government has announced the ban on alcohol. I would like to say Do not be drunk, it can be fun to enjoy during this long holiday period.
Starting this 11th National Economic and Social Development Plan, I emphasize the importance of agriculture as a major food and energy producer.
This is because of the "strong Thai operation" which is investing in water resources. The farmers can produce more crops per acre.
I'm going to the northeast to see the source of the water. In order to push the Thai strong to meet the target.
#Transportation system in Thailand will be implemented in many ways: 1. Improvement of railroads nationwide, which is very dilapidated.
# Transportation system The train can speed up service. Both travel and freight.
# Transport System 3. It is considered that routes around Bangkok are suitable for high speed trains.
# Transport system 4. Link to ASEAN network To the south of China. And down to Malaysia, Singapore.
This week I will travel to Vietnam. It will be planned to open areas such as the Northeast to the sea, the port of Vietnam or other ways.

This year, the organization ranked Thailand's competitiveness has improved from 27th to 26th. We do not think that this figure should be satisfied.
I would like to reiterate to the brothers that I and the government aim at that. Our work is now looking to work in the long term.
Therefore, the seminar organized a private sector. It is important to have the experts in the rankings meet for 2 days.
This is how we can improve our competitiveness. It will be called the confidence, create opportunities for trade, investment and tourism.
I got to work and follow the seminar. It will be adjusted to the government policy and the National Economic and Social Development Plan.
Last week, there was a follow up to the solution of the public brotherhood that I considered the most difficult problem. People are having problems eating.
The solution to the problem in the past was limited. The ownership of the land then changed hands. Finally, poor people do not have to eat again.
The concept of "community deed" will be able to give ownership to the people who will care for the poor people in the land use to solve the problem.
Around August this will begin the regulation of the community deed along with @korndemocrat. Land tax This will contribute to the distribution of land holdings.
This land tax has an additional idea that will fund part of the land fund. To help solve the problem of the people who do not continue to eat.

Last week, the maturity of the project will be reported on the bus project.
Our goal is to make the bus service better with the BMA lost from the loss that the Cabinet has given transportation to consult with NATION to spend another 30 days.
Bus reforms are not limited to rental or hire purchase. Established company The government will decide transparently.
There are issues to be addressed in the Bangkok area. Within August, the mass transit master plan will be adjusted. The administrator has disabled public write access.
The key issue is the extension of the BTS route. North of the new bridge to Pathum Thani. And east to Samutprakarn.
In addition, there is a tendency to study additional BTS routes. From Bangkapi to Minburi From Minburi to Ramindra to the center.
It will be possible to study the possibility of adding two BTS routes to the master plan of the Bangkok metro system.

But the country can not live without the law. There is no where to be judged wrongly because there is a lot of cheering.
If the law is not legal, the country is difficult. And it will increase the value of the lawlessness to become a political movement until the use of weapons.
I intend to stop this condition. The wrong attitude is that "good but not honest. Just alchemy is enough. "

Finishing press conference. In minutes at www.pinera2010.cl
I have a question about @PM_Abhisit, such as whether Prime Minister Abhisit or whether the message is a tweet of the Prime Minister actually or not.
That's a good thing. @PM_Abhisit is also not a Twitter account "official" of Prime Minister Abhisit.
The reason is twitter Prime Minister will be officially launched early this August. In the end it is expected to continue from @PM_Abhisit.
But past accounts @PM_Abhisit are in charge of the volunteer team. I do not know what to do.
For the future of @PM_Abhisit ask permission to keep the story at the end. After explaining other issues. Okay then.
What is twitter @PM_Abhisit?
Former account @PM_Abhisit set up to present the speech of Prime Minister Abhisit has published through various media. Adapted to presentations via MicroBlog.
Our work is like an independent journalist. The content of the news is presented by the Prime Minister Abhisit's words.
The Prime Minister Abhisit I have been through the account @PM_Abhisit for a long time and see that it does not damage.
Abhisit sees the importance of communicating government information via Twitter so that our team can continue to work.
However, "repeat" that Prime Minister Abhisit has never granted that account @PM_Abhisit is your official Twitter account.
What are you going to do?
On the 26th of July, the team worked as usual by presenting the speech of the Prime Minister. From the list of confidence Thailand as ever.
Thaksin is the same as Thaksin. @thaksinlive I'm misunderstanding that @PM_Abhisit is Prime Minister Abhisit. Reply to message as big news.
Thaksin may just start using Twitter via @thaksinlive for the first time and do not know how to check the identity of the account on Twitter.
If there is no official Twitter launch like @thaksinlive .. will notice the Verify symbol at each Twitter screen.
For example, an account named Thaksin or similar. Currently there are 10 accounts and can be added in just a few minutes.
The problem is more aggressive when the media maintains the point that there is direct communication between them. Prime Minister Abhisit and former Prime Minister Thaksin
I know that misunderstanding. The team tried to coordinate information with the Prime Minister. But the media to interview the Prime Minister before.
The team can coordinate with @SatitTrang, @korndemocrat, @apirak_news and the party spokesman PPP even had a description through the media yesterday.
When the clarification is understood. I'm going to ask you about the future of account @PM_Abhisit.
The twitter will be officially launched around the beginning of August. All will be part of the launch of the new website.
Which details of the new website launch? I have to offer from the team directly responsible offline.
In the twitter section from now, @PM_Abhisit will stop working to give the team a formal appointment. To take care of it.
RT: RT @John_John: I do not know what you're talking about. Not a personal account It will be launched in August, which will use the "verified" service of twitter.
